attributes.action: If Scotland goes independent from the UK then it is NEVER to become eligible for Foreign Aid from the English, Welsh and NI taxpayer.
attributes.additional_details: Scotland has received much, much more of the UK taxpayers pound than it should and if it goes independent, and I seriously hope it does, then it should NEVER be able to use its status as a foreign country from England, Wales and Northern Ireland to receive aid from the taxpayer funded International Aid Department of the English government.
